post.author: 김태희
post.content:
.Net Developers Permanent and Contract,
METAFORE
Toronto, ON, CANADA  1 Position(s)
Posted Feb 17, 2010

Metafore Associates are dedicated professionals representing some of the best IT minds in the industry. People whose passion for technology is surpassed only by a desire shared by all Metafore Associates - to provide significant and measurable value to our clients.
Metafore celebrates the diversity of our communities, and is committed to Employment Equity within our workforce. Metafore hires on the basis of merit and welcomes all qualified applications from women, members of visible minorities, Aboriginal persons, and persons with disabilities.
Click Here To Apply To Metafore
All applicants must have strong WF experience (1 year plus)

.Net Developers
We need consultants downtown with following permanent applicants only. please send CV with rate

WCF, .Net 3.5, ASP.Net, LINQ, SQL, XML,
Visual Studio 2008.

Please do not apply if you do not have WF experience

Compensation: 75-85K perm depending on experience and 45-55 contract
jcorcoran@metafore.ca
post.title: .NET Developer -Metafore
